```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```


## Problem 1:

Reading and cleaning **Mr. Trash Wheel** sheet.

```{r trashwheel_df}
trashwheel_df = 
  read_xlsx(
    "data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
    sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
    range = cell_cols("A:N")) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(
    sports_balls = round(sports_balls),
    sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls)
  )
```
